Classes

struct  WireTypeDef
 Equals the spirit:wireTypeDef element in IP-Xact specification. More...

Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:wire element in IP-Xact specification under spirit:component element.

Describes the properties for ports that are of wire style.

Definition at line 29 of file wire.h.

bool Wire::hasType ( const QString &  viewName = QString()  )  const

Check if the wire has a type name in given view.

If view is not defined then all possibilities are checked and if no type is specified for any view false is returned.

Parameters:
viewName The name of the view that's type name is searched for.
Returns:
bool False if type is not defined.
